Package com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service

Class TourGuideService

java.lang.Object
com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service.TourGuideService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITourGuideService
@Service public class TourGuideService extends Object implements ITourGuideService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the user location and reward system.
Version:
1.1
Author:
[NPC]TourGuide BackEnd Team, SÃ©bastien Cappon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(User user)
    A method that puts an user into the internalUserMap declared below, if and only if the internalUserMap doesn't contain it.
    List<AttractionNearUserDto>
    formatNearbyAttractionList(User user, gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation, List<gpsUtil.location.Attraction> nearbyAttractions)
    A method that formats the attractions in a list of attractions passed in parameter so that it returns the name, latitude and longitude of each attraction, as well as the user's position, the distance between the two and the points that the attraction concerned could bring back.
    List<gpsUtil.location.Attraction>
    getNearbyAttractionList(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation)
    A GET method that returns an Attraction list of all the five nearest attractions to VisitedLocation passed as parameter
    UsersTracker
    getTracker()
     
    List<tripPricer.Provider>
    getTripDealList(User user)
    A GET method that returns a Provider list of provides offering trip deals based on the number of reward points the User passed in parameter has accumulated.

    getUserByName(String userName)
    A GET method that returns a User whose user name is passed as parameter after calling the getter of the Map<String, User>

    getUserList()
    A GET method that returns a list of User.
    gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation
    getUserLocation(User user)
    A GET method that returns the VisitedLocation for the User passed as a parameter after, if he has already visited some locations.
    List<Reward>
    getUserRewardList(User user)
    A GET method that returns a Reward list for the User passed as a parameter after calling the UserReward getter of User class.
    Map<UUID,gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation>
    trackEachUserLocation(List<User> users)
    A method that allows the trackUserLocation() method to be executed asynchronously on a list of users passed as parameter in order to improve the application's performance.
    gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation
    trackUserLocation(User user)
    A method that gets the current location of an User passed as parameter, then add it to a list of visited locations and update the reward score.

    • trackEachUserLocation

      public Map<UUID,gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation> trackEachUserLocation(List<User> users) throws InterruptedException
      A method that allows the trackUserLocation() method to be executed asynchronously on a list of users passed as parameter in order to improve the application's performance.
      Specified by:
